alert.note: Alert for Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 4:25AM CDT until April 20 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... North central Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Southeastern Holt County in northwestern Missouri... Central Andrew County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 424 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Highland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Highland, Troy, Country Club Villa, Country Club, Oregon, Amazonia, Forest City, Fillmore, White Cloud, Rosendale, Severance, Rea, Leona, St. Joseph Airport, Iowa Point and Fanning. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 46 and 75. Interstate 229 between mile markers 5 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
